landing.bio: Experienced Member Technical with a demonstrated history of working in the non-profit organization management industry. Skilled in Python (Programming Language), C++, Java, HTML, and JavaScript. Strong engineering professional with a Bachelor of Technology - BTech focused in Computer Science from Jaypee University of Engineering and Technology.And looking for an opportunity in Software Development.

experience.aboutWork: Responsible for building the server-client web application so that it displays a graph that automatically updates as it gets data from the server application.
Responsible for building the end-to-end web application using Django.
This specialisation Python for everybody course , introduce fundamentals of programming concepts including data structures, networked application prgram interfaces, ans databases, using the Python
This specialisation helps me to learn different concepts of data structures.

education.university: Jaypee University of Engineering and Technology

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors.I love playing Football and Chess.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of fantasy genre movies and television shows, I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the back-end web development world.
